name: Cool Ninja Game Fun Jumping
description:
How high can you jump?
Journey up a funny world, perpetually jumping from one platform to the next, picking up star packs, avoiding enemies, obstacles and try to survive as long as you can. Collect stars, open new units, achieve better score and have a lot of fun.

How to play:
Just tilt to move left or right.

***And be warned: this game is insanely fun, cool and addictive!***
